mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, classification_id=#{classification.id}, price=#{price}, sales_volume=#{salesVolume}, discount=#{discount}, discount_price=#{discountPrice}, introduction=#{introduction}, sort=#{sort} where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into reserve (customer_id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reservation_type, reserve_time, reservations_mode, remarks) values(#{customer.id},#{reservationsName}, #{reservationsSex},#{reservationsTel},#{reservationsNum},#{reservationsStartTime}, #{reservationType},NOW(),#{reservationsMode},#{remarks});
mapper.select: SELECT reserve.id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reservation_type, reserve_time, reservations_mode, remarks, box.id AS box_id,room_number,room_size,room_name, menu.id AS menu_id,menu.name AS menu_name,large_price,medium_price,small_price,discount,discount_price FROM reserve_box LEFT JOIN reserve ON reserve.id=reserve_box.reserve_id LEFT JOIN box ON box.id=reserve_box.box_id LEFT JOIN reserve_menu ON reserve.id=reserve_menu.reserve_id LEFT JOIN menu ON menu.id=reserve_menu.menu_id WHERE reserve.id=#{id}
